comment: Two ways to express "exactly one thing exists". The left-hand side requires only one variable to express this. Both sides are false in set theory, see theorem ~ dtru . (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 7-Oct-2022.)
